title: Incredible!
text: Unbelievable that these structures where built so long ago by hand. An incredible achievement. Washrooms are hard to find, I limited my liquid intake. The museum is worth seeing as well.

title: Well maintained
text: Really enjoyed carriage ride around park. Worth noting that city shuts horse rides down about noon if it gets to hot. We just made ours before it was shut for the day. Carful of street sellers a lot of time they are scams, buy online or directly from drivers. We walked from Hampton Manhattan about 35 min walk. Tried to use Uber back, someone told us to share ride I’ll never do that again as they kept rescheduling ride with different drivers pay the extra $5.

title: Still a marvel after all these years
text: Building is very well kept up. It’s designed to handle a lot of people, we went in. The evening, it was quieter not really much for line ups so we didn’t pay the extra to to get up there quicker. Staff is very efficient in keeping lines moving. Great view at the top a little crowded but if you waited a few minutes you got a good spot. We walked from the Hampton Manhattan it wasn’t to far as broad way cuts across

title: Fenway pre game
text: Really great fish and chips, great place to get fed and watered before game. Service was very prompt which was surprising being the amount of people in there. Close to gate C at Fenway

title: Great park
text: Enjoyed game in the smaller park. Jays spanked Boston so that was a plus for us being Canadians lol. Friendly park and great fans! One thing I got caught on is gate D is not between C and E it’s on the other side of the park which made us a little late. We ate just outside the park at Landsdowne pub food was reasonable and fairly quick. Another issue I had was my daughter had booked us a pick from a limo service as we where pressed for time after the game, he was to pick us at jersey and van ness. That area isn’t available for pick up, it’s blocked for people exiting the game. The driver didn’t seem to know that so wasted some time I didn’t have getting picked up..

title: Nice tour
text: Good day, didn’t really see a lot of fish. Sailed to spot but powered home. It’s nice warm water. I have had better cat trips for sure but was not the worst, pretty basic cruise. No munchies, swizzle was excellent. Captain was entertaining. I really appreciate a fresh water rinse when I get out of water, some boats do some don’t and this boat doesn’t. All and all good time but if your looking to see reef fish go near a reef not a sandy bottom bay

title: Excellent snorkeling
text: Disgusting portable washrooms , holding tanks full obviously are not being maintained regularly, stink is bad. Regular facility out of service. I don’t mind the $5 parking but they could do a little maintenance. Gray plAce to snorkel seen turtle, lots of fish and my wife seen a manta. Lots of shaded area

title: Groceries
text: Handy place with fresh produce. It’s a bit pricey but more reasonable than a corner store with great variety

title: Great food
text: Fish and chips where good a little disappointed on the portion ( 3 small pieces of fish) good thing I wasn’t real hungry. Service was great but it was the second time I seen dogs at the table and I don’t mind seeing them there but when they are on the table like this time it’s a bit much.

title: Nice quiet beach
text: Great for sun bathing and swimming but a poor snorkeling area compared to others beaches not a lot of fish. Not crowded at all . Close to queens mall if you need anything and highly recommend lava lava beach club for eats.

title: Great food
text: Have ate here several times and always went away satisfied. Staff is friendly and competent. The cafe is smaller and very busy you will likely have to wait, put your name in the book when you get there and mark “table” or you will be seated at the counter. Most breakfast meals come with 2 probably 12” fluffy delicious pancakes so if your a big eater your at the right place. Tried the sea food platter it was good came with boneless beef ribs very good

title: Evening smorge is very good
text: Very small restaurant, its very good food, no a huge selection how every what they have is fresh and good

title: Quick get er done meal
text: Good service and very reasonable, I usually do daily special. I haven't tried the Chinese out but things like hot beef sandwich.

title: Nice quiet place to eat
text: Great food really enjoyed fish and chips. I have been a few times, never crowded and great food at a reasonable cost.

title: Nice haddock fillet
text: Enjoyed my fish & chips. Dill dipping sauce is very good. Building is a bit noisy when crowded so if your looking for a quiet place I wouldn’t recommend it but we enjoyed ourselves

title: Excellent lassagna
text: Really enjoy the back bacon lasagna. Nice clean place to eat. Good place to have lunch always a lunch special

title: Likely the worst service ever
text: Trip started with our carry on weight was over , check in weighed it and said it would be $240 if we wanted to check it or we could take it on plane. Got to boarding a miserable loading attendant made us check bags and said it would be $50 each but she charged us $60 saying they wouldn’t make the flight. All our meds were in the carry on, we didn’t think nor did attendants think to ask if we had them. We had to taxi back to airport when next flight came in. No service, not even a glass of water on a 3hr flight. Knees where on the seat ahead of me. Probably one thing I am getting very aggravated with is the intercom, the attendants are bored with there job and plat out there instructions cutting off or missing words assuming your catching what they are throwing but I didn’t understand very little of it. they do have some good routes unfortunately so we used them but pretty sure it’s going to be a long time before it happens again.

title: Very organized and enjoyable way to fly
text: Staff are very helpful and organized to quickly load and get you flying. Hot meal and a complementary alcoholic beverage with snacks. Quit enjoyed flight

title: Excellent place to stay
text: Very clean and comfortable bedding. Very private upstairs 2 bedroom with condiment and small fridge. Free Wi Fi. Very nice breakfast selection, I had the quiche it was very good. Shower and bath tub. John and Julia made us feel at home. We would certainly stay again

title: Good burgers
text: Good burger at a fair price, meat pies looked excellent but had run out. Food service closes early probably due to hot water beach area is only at low tide, that’s when bulk of people seem to be there.

title: Very popular
text: Have to access beach about 2 hrs before low tide and I will have about 4hrs access. Quit crowded, most areas where water is seeping out of sand are 2 hot, you have to dig to the side of these with some cooler water to blend in. There is only limited spots that are just right making it quit crowded. It is worth seeing. Shovels can be rented at hotties

title: Where it began
text: Enjoyed seeing lord of rings hobbit set. Really enjoyed the movies and to see the actual set was nice. The set is just the facades of the hobbit homes and outdoors however the inn is operational and you can have some ale

title: Good food
text: Enjoyed the fish and chips, burger was good to. Plank fired pizza looked very good but I didn’t try. Outside service which we enjoyed. Order at the bar service

title: Fresh clean room
text: Has small kitchenette if your so inclined. Vert comfortable bedding slept well. French press ask for the coffee at office. Very fresh modern rooms. Very friendly helpful staff. Large modern shower no bath tub

title: Unique trendy hotel
text: It’s a very different style hotel, nice change. Really enjoyed the breakfast. The down side we rented 2 rooms and neither a/c wasn’t working. Employee had to turn water back on to it which tells me something was wrong with it , still didn’t work and I didn’t get sleep as room was to hot and they had no other rooms available.. If you stay go to the room and ensure it works before you take room. My wife also enjoys having a sit down area with a mirror with a wing for doing her hair makeup, no such area. Poor shower area control on opposite wall so you have to step out of shower to control, shower water also goes all over bathroom no containment and no bath tub. Staff very nice

title: Unique classy hotel
text: Enjoyed our stay. Clean room, very friendly helpful staff. Nice pool. Concierge excellent for booking activities. Excellent location walking distance to warf for reef excursions and warf dinning is a must try water bar grill you won’t be disappointed. Scenic railroad is also a nice adventure worth seeing also within walking distance

title: Excellent site seeing
text: We did the class 3 (easy) and really enjoyed the scenery and ended with a nice tea and treat. Guide took us around Napier a bit after we really enjoyed!

title: Great view
text: Good. View of surrounding area. Saw our ship in harbour. Worked in with our return to Napier from white water rafting

title: Best ribs
text: Large portion of well done ribs, excellent hamburgers. If you like chicken fingers and are hungry order the meal not shown on menu you will likely really enjoy. It’s s little loud so if your looking for a quite place it’s not it.

title: Pew with a view
text: Antique cars very retro. Really enjoyed trip and small zoo in village. Lots to look at many small shops. Great view of gorge, water falls and I like trains. Great staff, lots of restrooms

title: Excellent trip!
text: Enjoyed trip to reef. Staff were very helpful. Nice dinner meal. Sort of crowded and some people haven’t figured out that 2 people can’t hog a 10 person table on a ship. I do wish staff would try to keep people from sounds that. But really enjoyed trip thanks

title: Very unique harbor
text: Enjoyed our ferry ride down passage that came along with Anderson blue mountain tours, there is a sunset dinner cruise I wish we would have tried.

title: Ono delicious !
text: Catch of the day happened to be Ono and I wasn't disappointed . Nice place to have a beach lunch. Affordable and excellent atmosphere I would like to try dinner sometime

title: Great variety
text:
We enjoyed the atmosphere, they have enjoyable service and the staff appear to enjoy there jobs. Fish and chips where excellent but jambolia was a let down, had it much seafood and had broken. mussels mixed in. They have sever
al sea food dishes wished I hadn't picked jambolia. I believe meals are pretty good value and I would certainly eat here again.

title: Best value on big island!
text: Really enjoyed our day trip to captain cook snorkelling area. Probably best snorkelling area anywhere, many species of reef fish and plenty of them. Tripped topped up with continental breakfast and barbecue burgers for lunch, beautiful ship and excellent staff highly recommended
place: Fair Wind Big Island Ocean Guides

title: Excellent dolphin adventure!
text: Great opportunity to be around wild dolphins. Our guides seemed to want to cut our encounter short when there was dolphins still around and sidetracked us with whale watching which is cruising around and we never seen any so make sure you insist on what you want your paying the bill. Staff never offered fresh water for rinse either ensure you get salt water off you and your gear when your done

title: Excellent fish and chips!
text: Enjoyed my swi fish and chips ( not sure of spelling). Nice panco crust. Staff friendly and helpful, very affordable food and schooner beer. Highly recommended

title: They tried!
text: Captain Robert and Tyler trolled us around and put in a good effort however this is my second full day of fishing the Kona area with no results which leaves me thinking it is pretty poor value. I am disappointed there is no bait option especially when the bite is poor you might try changing methods. Dragging hardware around hour after hour wasting fuel and time. This seems to be the method used by most operators in this area and I can't see the value as it basically a $1000 a day for a good chance of no action. I will not put in any more time unless there is a bait option.

title: Excellent pasta!
text: Waiter suggested supremo fetachini, with scallops and smoked salmon it was very good! Priced very reasonable on dinner menu. Quite enjoyed the meal

title: Very fresh and clean
text: Nice place to stay, very clean. Enjoyed visiting with staff they are very friendly . Breakfast was very good thank you. Only issue is there does not appear to be much sound proofing between bathrooms and you know when your neighbour is running a bath or flushing
place: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Billings West

title: Renovated nice but disappointed with food
text: Lasagna had some quite different spice that somewhat bad tasting maybe good to others but beware you will be getting something different from the old menu also lacked noodles. It was mostly sauce. The stir fry was good. The manager only gave us %25 of lasagna plus attitude on the uneatable lasagna. Won't be going back to bad.

title: Order by Ipnone very handy
text: Really found this handy Panago has an app with menu and you can order from it and pick it up. It tells you when it will be ready and it was right on/ We had a chicken pizza it was very good wasn't sure about the corn on it but we like it with the cilantro chipotle sauce.

title: Excellent Bar Steak
text: Really enjoyed our bar steaks they came with fresh vegetables. They where on special that day for 9.95, so excellent value. Service friendly but don't be in a hurry.

title: Fresh clean hotel
text: Enjoyed comfortable beds in a roomy clean new room. Handy to trans canada hgwy and Tim hortons. Room faced hgwy and u could not leave a window open to sleep but ac worked good and I slept great. Very nice breakfast till 10am

title: Great service
text: Our waiter really looked after us and gave us a splash of complementary wine. I like salad and their salad is complementary with a meal and all you can eat. It's house Italian dressing, very tasty with pickled hot peppers for a bit of zip. I had lasagna Classico for main course which was good with a couple kinds of cheese.

title: Grouchy daddy but great service!!
text: Had the fish and chips, it came hot and tasty. A excellent full haddock fillet and I quit enjoyed it. Staff looked after us and very freindly. We will be eating there again. This restaurant can be somewhat noisy if crowded due I think to its open design.

title: Great Selection of Food
text: There is a great selection of food, coffee's and teas. There is a coffee roaster on the first floor. There are several restaurants as well and especially wanted to try the fish at Busters Sea Food but had just had a big meal prior to getting there. There is all sorts of nic nacks and handy work as well they have it all! You can spend all afternoon going through it.

title: Large Portions
text: Enjoyed out dinner at the old syle dinner. Service was good for us and food was hot and tasty. The portions where large so if your hungry its a good place to go. They serve breakfast all day.

title: Great Tour!
text: Enjoyed our tour of how they make the lager, very interesting as well a the 3 fired guy owner story. Learned a bit about how they brew lager and ale but best of all is the sampling haha. very friendly bunch and recomend taking the tour for $10 and get a 1/2 sack to go. You have to book tour so they open at around noon so go then

title: The Power of Niagra
text: Old tunnels that go about a third the way across horse shoe falls. They have a couple view points that you can see behind the falls and an outdoor observation area toward bottom of falls. I thought it was interesting

title: Handy location
text: We took in a couple Jays games and stayed here. The location is good you are within walking distance of Rogers and if your into hockey the Air Canada Centre. You can also take the Path at the North end of the Air Canada Centre and will take you to Union station and the subway. The hotel is right on thr Harbor on Lake Ontario but not a very active harbor at least not there but sort of a nice walk along it.Our room was sort of small not really what is shown on there site pic's and I wish they would keep the sink out of the bathroom so you could get a drink of water or get ready while bathroom is being used. It is an older hotel but it has been kept up. Bedding is great and very comfortable. They forgot to mention parking is about a 5min walk away and $35/ n or you can use valet for $45 sort of a rip off but downtown parking is expensive.

title: Great food and interesting place
text: We had dinner here and staff was very good serving us. The food was pasta of course which we like and can cooked well and very tasty. I hate over cooked pasta and they did not do that, it was just right. They have the restaurant decorated with alot of antiques and alot of old glass artifacts, very interesting. Rest rooms where very clean

title: Impressive!!
text: Massive falls that is easy to see. Best location to view is from the Falls Casino. Walk in the entrance to the casino, hang a right down past alot of shops, down the escalator and exit outside. There is an excellent path along the crest of the hill with look outs however somewhat obstructed by trees. Continue west to the inclined rail road and you will get a fabulous view of the falls. Continuue down inclined railway (costs 2.50) to horseshoe falls information building and you will be able get a great view of the American falls. Inside upstairs there is a very nice place to sit and have a drink and small lunch on the left as you come in from railway (not Elements, its a dinning but probable nice to) and best view of horse shoe falls I found and least crowded. You can also access falls casino path from skylon parking lot there is a walkway over the road to the casino, After crossing stay left to south side of casino and follow walk way to inclined railway
